title: Casting News + RHUGT & RHOA Recaps!
itunes:title: Casting News + RHUGT & RHOA Recaps!
description:
Danny recaps the breaking RHOC casting news before diving in to The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip: Ex Wives Club. After exploring the cinnamon stick metaphor, he comes back from the break to recap The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured the return of Lisa Wu, a pajama party, and "coochie incense."


RHOA Recap: 19:00ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
